name: Sommerro
description: Conveniently set in Oslo, Sommerro provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre and a terrace. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can have a drink at the bar. At the hotel, each room has a wardrobe. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, certain rooms at Sommerro also offer a city view. At the accommodation each room includes bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or Italian options. At Sommerro you will find a restaurant serving British, Japanese and Spanish cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. The hotel offers a spa centre. Popular points of interest near Sommerro include Oslo Central Station, Akershus Fortress and The Royal Palace. The nearest airport is Oslo Airport, 52 km from the accommodation.

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Gabelshus
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Collection Hotel Gabelshus in Oslo, NO near the National Gallery. Our pet-friendly hotel is also near the Royal Palace, National Gallery and Frogner Park. Enjoy hotel amenities like free breakfast, wireless Internet access, an exercise room and a restaurant, light evening buffet, to name a few. All guest rooms have refrigerators, hair dryers, irons, ironing boards and TVs. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues. Please note that all Choice Hotels in Scandinavia are non-smoking properties. Children under the age of 9 stay free of charge in the existing bedding of a room shared with a paying adult. Pet accommodations are available, please contact the hotel for more information.Choice Hotels

name: Clarion Hotel Oslo
description: Situated in Oslo, just a 10-minute walk from Bussterminalen Oslo, the hotel provides 4-star accommodation and free wireless internet. It is located a short stroll from the Oslo Opera House and Oslo Spektrum. This charming hotel offers an in-house gym, meeting rooms and a 24-hour reception. Conference rooms, luggage storage and room service are also provided. Rooms at Clarion Hotel Oslo are comfortable and feature tea and coffee making facilities, a mini bar and blackout curtains. They offer a seating area, a desk and an in-room safe. During their stay at Clarion Hotel Oslo, guests can dine at Kitchen & Table and relax with a drink at Shutter Bar. The hotel is close to Oslo Central Station, making it easy for guests to explore Oslo and its surrounding areas. The People's Theatre, Oslo Cathedral and the Astrup Fearnley Museum of Modern Art are a brief stroll away.Revato

name: Saga Hotel Oslo, BW Premier Collection
description: Within a family orientated setting of design-hotels, Saga Hotels comprises of four contrasting concepts dotted throughout Oslo City Centre. Four underlying characteristics of Saga Hotels can be defined by its promise of high standards, trendy interior, exceptional service and relaxing atmosphere. 'Making home feel closer'. The journey of Saga Hotels first began in Frogner, where Saga Hotel Oslo, BW Premier Collection was established. This beautiful setting, rich in heritage, and surrounded by the quaint architecture of Majorstuen was a prosperous beginning to what would eventually expand the family into three new concepts throughout Oslo. Each individual concept focuses on attracting various types of travelers whilst catering to their everyday needs and desires. Our reception area will be renovated from October 16th until March 1st, 2024. This may result in slightly more noise than usual.bestwestern.com

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Folketeateret
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Collection Hotel Folketeateret in Oslo, Norway near the airport express train and central station. Our hotel is also near the Akerhus Fortress landmark, Kon-Tiki Museum, National Gallery art museum and the Oslo Spectrum stadium. Enjoy hotel amenities like free breakfast, free high-speed Internet, an exercise room and a nightly managers reception. All guest rooms have standard room amenities. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues.Choice Hotels

name: Amerikalinjen
description: Located right in the city centre of Oslo, Amerikalinjen is a vibrant boutique hotel named after the 19th century cruise ship line of the same name. Free WiFi and a 24/7 front-desk are provided for guests' comfort. The elegantly decorated guest rooms in the hotel are all fitted with a Nespresso coffee machine and a minibar. Some rooms feature a balcony, and the private bathroom is equipped with a walk-in shower, complimentary toiletries and stylish mosaic tiles. Guests can enjoy a work desk and a flat-screen TV. All rooms are furnished with Norwegian designer lamps and unique objects from the history of Amerikalinjen. The boutique hotel offers multiple lounge bars and restaurants, including a cocktail bar and an intimate club inspired by New York's jazz scene. A Norwegian-American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property's brasserie. A 24-hour, state-of-the-art fitness center is offered, where guests can enjoy weight-training, yoga and more. The wellness department includes a Finnish sauna. The bilingual staff at Amerikalinjen are always available to provide advice and recommendations at the reception. Aker Brygge is 3.2 km from the hotel, while Karl Johan shopping street is a stone throw's away. The Norwegian National Opera & Ballet is a 5 minute walk from the Amerikalinjen. The nearest airport is Oslo Airport, 49 km from the property.

name: Thon Hotel Terminus
description: Situated a 2-minute walk from Oslo Central Station, Thon Hotel Terminus offers free WiFi and rooms with flat-screen TVs and free Nespresso in reception. The Rockefeller Music Hall is 350 metres away. All the brightly decorated rooms at Thon Terminus Hotel feature wooden or carpeted floors and private bathrooms. Each is equipped with a work desk and minibar. A popular buffet breakfast is served each morning in the glass-roofed breakfast room. Free tea and coffee is available in the lobby throughout the day. Karl Johans gate shopping street is a 5-minute walk from the hotel. The Norwegian Opera House is 750 metres away.

name: Thon Hotel Opera
description: This hotel is conveniently located only 100 metres from Oslo Central Station and 300 metres from Oslo Opera House. A large breakfast buffet and a bar specialising in Gin-based drinks are featured. Each room at Thon Hotel Opera include armchairs, minibars and a variety of TV channels. Free WiFi is available throughout. Fresh fruit, homemade bread and both hot and cold dishes are served at breakfast. Thon Hotel Opera’s popular restaurant, Scala, offers Norwegian specialties as well as international dishes. Snacks and other refreshments can be enjoyed at the hotel bar, Eufemia. The fitness centre at Thon Hotel Opera features an outdoor terrace and views from the fourth floor. Attractions such as the Akershus Fortress and the National Theatre are both reached within 15 minutes’ on foot. In addition, the express train to Oslo Gardermoen Airport is just around the corner.

name: Hotel Bristol
description: This elegant hotel is 850 metres from Oslo Central Station and 2 minutes’ walk from the main street Karl Johans gate. It offers free Wi-Fi, along with free gym and sauna access. Hotel Bristol’s bright rooms have a TV and minibar. All feature charming, antique-style furniture and interiors. Guests can try traditional Norwegian food at the Bristol Grill, which has an English-pub feel. A popular meeting point for politicians, musicians and actors since the 1920s, the Library Bar offers live piano music. Bristol Hotel is only 3 minutes’ walk from the National Theatre and the National Gallery.

name: Voksenasen Hotell, BW Signature Collection
description: High above Oslo, with a view that takes your breath away, is Voksenasen. The hotel is surrounded by beautiful nature, with good public transport connections to Oslo's bustling cultural life. Our restaurant offers fresh Nordic ingredients. Parking is free. At Voksenasen, you can be sure that we do everything to make you as a guest feel well taken care of, regardless of whether you are here on behalf of work, as a wedding guest or as a tourist. Airy and bright common areas with art that invites to spontaneous conversations, good beds and inviting scents from the restaurant. From the center of Oslo, you can easily and conveniently get around by car and public transport. Love to ski and move in the woods and fields? Then Voksenasen is the place for you. With our location in Nordmarka, you reach within 5 minutes drive no less than three brilliant opportunities for outdoor activities; Tryvann, Holmenkollen and Nordmarka. In summer it may be appropriate with a glass of bubbles on the terrace or a round in the outdoor pool. Let yourself be tempted by our pizza and homemade ice cream that tastes best outside and in the company of good friends. Tryvann is home to Eastern Norway's largest alpine center. In the summer, the facility offers climbing for all ages and skill levels in the climbing park High & Low. Roseslottet sits at the top of Frognerseteren. For Voksenasen, as a hotel with a background in humanitarian aid during World War II, Roseslottet is close to our hearts and offers space and art. Holmenkollen offers good trails for both skiing and roller skiing and world-class sports experiences. Here is also the Ski Museum, with the opportunity to take the trip all the way up to the top of Holmenkollbakken. In summer, you can end the visit with a zipline trip in Kollensvevet. Nordmarka is the entire Oslo hiking area and offers mile after mile of well-groomed ski trails, well-marked hiking trails, bathing water and cabins for a waffle.bestwestern.com

name: Lysebu Hotel
description: Lysebu Hotel is located at Tryvannshøyden Hill above Oslo, 750 metres from the Voksenkollen metro station. It offers excellent dining, free WiFi and free private parking. All rooms at Hotel Lysebu have a work desk, and a private bathroom with shower. Some rooms feature a flat-screen TV and views of Sørkedalen Valley and Norefjell Mountain. The in-house restaurant serves Norwegian cuisine and features large panoramic windows and Nordic art on the walls. The restaurant offers a new 5-course menu every week, based upon seasonal ingredients and accompanied with selected wines. During summer, guests can dine out on the terrace. The hotel has a wine cellar and can arrange wine-tasting sessions. Art exhibitions and live music events are sometimes hosted by the hotel. Other facilities include a large garden, an indoor swimming pool and a lounge with fireplace. Popular activities among guests include skiing, hiking and cycling. Oslo city centre is a 40-minute metro ride away.

name: The Thief
description: Featuring rooms with a in-built sound system and private balcony, The Thief is a design boutique hotel on Tjuvholmen in Oslo. The promenade of Aker Brygge is within 5 minutes’ walk. The hotel offers in-room spa treatments, a spa centre and free around-the-clock gym access. Rooms at this stylish hotel feature a Nespresso machine, a mini-bar and a rainforest shower in the private bathroom. The Thief has 24-hour room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The Thief Spa includes a Turkish hamam bath, sauna and swimming pool. Guests can also relax on the chic rooftop terrace and enjoy contemporary Norwegian cuisine at the Thief Food Bar. All guests receive free entry to the Astrup Fearnley Museum of Modern Art, while the hotel is only a 15-minute walk from the centre of Oslo and the National Gallery. The nearest bus stop is at Vika Atrium 400 metres away, and the National Theatre train station 1.5 km away provides links to Oslo Gardermoen Airport.

name: Thon Hotel Storo
description: Opened in September 2018, this hotel is situated next to the Storo Storcenter shopping centre, between the Storo and Nydalen neighborhoods of Oslo, about 5 km from the city centre. It offers an on-site restaurant, bar and fitness centre. Free WiFi is available. The modern rooms at Thon Hotel Storo feature a smart TV, Bose stereo system and quality Jensen beds. A minibar, safe and desk are also standard in all rooms. Some feature a balcony, seating area and coffee machine. The restaurant offers seasonal produce, based on local and organic ingredients. During nice weather, guests can enjoy meals and drinks outdoors. Thon Hotel Storo serves a buffet breakfast daily. Nydalen Metro Stop is 500 metres away, as well as tram and airport express coach stops. An IMAX cinema complex is next to the hotel, along with a variety of shops, restaurants and bars. The Akerselva River is a 5-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Oslo Airport, 47 km from the hotel.

name: Karl Johan Hotel
description: Karl Johan Hotel is housed in a 19th-century building on Oslo’s main street, Karl Johans Gate, less than 700 metres from the Royal Palace. Guests enjoy free Wi-Fi. All guest rooms at Karl Johan have a work desk and flat-screen TV. Some guest rooms also offer views of the neighbouring Parliament building. The Stortinget Metro Station is just around the corner from Karl Johan Hotel, and the Central Station is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Clarion Hotel The Hub
description: Clarion Hotel The Hub is situated in Oslo and is within a 10-minute walk of Bussterminalen Oslo. This modern hotel is set in the heart of the city. This elegant Oslo hotel boasts an indoor pool and free Wi-Fi. Romance seekers will delight in the hotel's features like a sauna and honeymoon suites. The rooms at Clarion Hotel The Hub are air-conditioned and include a private balcony, a coffee maker and a mini bar. They feature a sofa bed, a seating area and an in-room safe. During their stay at Clarion Hotel The Hub, guests can dine at Norda and relax with a drink at Hub Bar. Breakfast is available each morning and can be enjoyed in the comfort of the rooms. Guests are also able to try one of the many bars and restaurants nearby. Clarion Hotel The Hub is conveniently located for sightseeing in Oslo, with Oslo Spektrum only moments away on foot. Oslo City Hall and Nationaltheatret Tram Station are within walking distance.Revato

name: Scandic Holmenkollen Park
description: Scandic Holmenkollen Park has opened its doors again, after extensive renovation and remodeling. The distinctive history and architecture have been meticulously preserved and complemented with modern design and solutions. The Hotel's capacity is a total of 376 guest rooms, including 27 exclusive rooms and suites in the historic Dragon Building. The Hotel also has a new and delicious spa with a pool and a large gym of 1,100 m2. Entrance to Artesia SPA should be booked well in advance of your stay due to limited capacity. Age limit 16 years. Entrance from NOK 195 for staying guests, per visit to the SPA facilities. In our restaurant Holmenkollen BISTRO you can enjoy our unique waffle concept during the day. Waffle fajitas with cheddar and salsa, Club waffle with chicken, or perhaps a waffle with cured ham, sour cream and salad? There are many flavor combinations, and here you can experience the waffle in a way you have never done before. For dinner you can choose from a tasty à la carte menu, where the dishes are based on short-traveled Norwegian and Nordic ingredients. Scandic Holmenkollen Park is a destination in itself, a full 350 meters above sea level, with fantastic views over Oslo and the Nordmarka right outside the hotel door. With immediate proximity to the Holmenkollen Skiarena National Complex, the Ski Museum and nature, you will find exciting outdoor activities for everyone. Here you have miles of hiking trails to choose from, and in winter you can go straight out on the WC trails that stretch into Nordmarka. Only minutes away from the hotel is Oslo Winter Park and in the summer you can challenge your fear of heights in one of the Nordic countries' largest climbing parks. The Hotel is only a subway ride away from the center of Oslo, it takes 30 minutes by subway from Oslo Central station to Holmenkollen station.

name: Camillas Hus
description: Ideally located in the centre of Oslo, Camillas Hus offers free WiFi throughout the property, a restaurant and free private parking for guests who drive. Boasting a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 1.8 km from Oslo Central Station, 1.9 km from Akershus Fortress and 500 metres from The Royal Palace. The property is non-smoking and is set 7.9 km from Sognsvann Lake. At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Rooms include a safety deposit box, while some rooms also feature a balcony. All guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Guests at Camillas Hus can enjoy a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include The Royal Palace Park, Rockefeller Music Hall and Frogner Park. The nearest airport is Oslo Airport, 49 km from Camillas Hus.

name: Radisson Blu Plaza Hotel, Oslo
address: Sonja Henies Plass 3 Postboks 9206, Oslo, Oslo
description: Situated in Oslo, Radisson Blu Plaza Hotel is set amongst a variety of shops and boutiques and is minutes on foot from Bussterminalen Oslo. This stylish hotel is set in the heart of the city. This 4-star hotel provides a coffee bar, an express check-in and check-out feature and valet parking. The front desk operates around the clock and the friendly staff can recommend places to visit and provide other tourist information. Rooms at Radisson Blu Plaza Hotel Oslo provide a stylish space to unwind, complete with a mini bar. Hot drinks can be brewed with the complimentary tea and coffee supplies, and savoured in the comfort of the room's seating area. During their stay at Radisson Blu Plaza Hotel, Oslo, guests can dine at 34 Restaurant and relax with a drink at Galway Bay. A continental and a buffet breakfast is served each morning. Guests are also able to try one of the various bars and restaurants in the surrounding area. Oslo's well-known attractions and landmarks are within close proximity to Radisson Blu Plaza Hotel, with Oslo Cathedral just a short stroll away. It is also within walking distance of Karl Johans gate, Stortinget and the Oslo Opera House.Revato

name: Radisson Red Oslo Okern
description: Located in Oslo and within 4.5 km of Oslo Central Station, Radisson RED Oslo Okern features a bar, non-smoking rooms, and free WiFi throughout the property. This 4-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The hotel has family rooms. At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Every room comes with a safety deposit box, while selected rooms are equipped with a terrace. At Radisson RED Oslo Okern you will find a restaurant serving Chinese, French and Japanese cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Languages spoken at the reception include English, Spanish, Norwegian and Swedish. Sognsvann Lake is 7.7 km from the accommodation, while Akershus Fortress is 8.6 km away. The nearest airport is Oslo Airport, 45 km from Radisson RED Oslo Okern.

name: Grand Hotel Oslo
description: Only two minutes from Karl Johans gate, Grand Hotel Oslo by Scandic is located in the heart of Oslo. Surrounded by local bars and restaurants, it is a short walk from Oslo Central Station. This 5-star hotel offers body treatments, a ballroom and free Wi-Fi. Corporate amenities include meeting rooms. It also has its very own spa and wellness centre, Artesia Spa. The luxurious feel of each room at Grand Hotel Oslo by Scandic is complemented by facilities like flat-screen TVs and mini bars. They all have a desk, a seating area and a private bathroom. The hotel offers a variety of places to have a meal, including Palmen and Eight. Room service is also available during certain times. The hotel is ideally located for sightseeing in Oslo with Oslo City Hall within walking distance. Guests can also visit Aker Brygge, Royal Palace and Oslo Spektrum.Revato

name: Thon Hotel Rosenkrantz Oslo
description: The newly renovated and eco-friendly Thon Hotel Rozenkrantz Oslo is located just 1 km from Aker Brygge and 700 metres from Oslo Central Station. Free WiFi access is available. Each room here will provide you with a flat-screen TV with pay-per-view and cable channels, air conditioning and a minibar. The bathroom includes a bath or shower and a hairdryer. At Thon Hotel Rozenkrantz Oslo you will also find a restaurant, bar and lounge. Other facilities offered at the property include a fitness centre, tour desk and luggage storage. The hotel 1.1 km from Oslo Bus Terminal. Oslo Lufthavn Airport is 37 km away.
